features: Unique antibacterial hand soap formula is clinically proven to eliminate 99.9% of bacteria
Moisturizers in the liquid hand soap leaves skin feeling soft and protected
Dermatologist tested to be gentle on hands and pH balanced hand wash that helps retain skin's natural moisture
A crisp, clean scented hand soap
Paraben free and formulated without phthalates
Biodegradable cleaning ingredients and recyclable bottle for an eco-friendly formula
body.description: This unique antibacterial liquid hand soap formula cleans while leaving your skin feeling soft and protected. It is clinically proven to eliminate 99.9% of bacteria (in a handwashing test VS the following common harmful bacteria: S. Aureus & E. coli). Due to its unique formula, the liquid hand soap pump should only be refilled with Softsoap Antibacterial Liquid Hand Soap. It is best to wash hands with soap and clean running water for 20 seconds.

reviews.reviewText: I love the smell of this soap, and in my opinion, the price is fantastic for the quantity, and how long it lasts.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smell, and anti-bacterial
reviews.reviewText: What I like about it most is it fits in my automatic hand soap dispenser, and does not clog the spout. Very nice fragrance. And the fact that it is antibacterial assures. I will purchase it again. The price is also very reasonable for the amount of product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice smelling antibacterial hand soap!
reviews.reviewText: i love the smell and scent on this antibacterial hand soap! tea and berry scented has just a nice clean smell of berry and you can use it for a very long time as well. Great product for our bathroom use and we'll be ordering more in the future. Thank you Amazon for putting out great products and always great pricings ! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It May In The End . . . Just Come Down To Price
reviews.reviewText: Whether you buy this brand through Amazon or your local favorite store, I can assure you honestly that the product you're getting is exactly the same item. Some reviewers claim it seems a lot more watery when you buy it through Amazon but that's really not the case. Anti bacterial soap when applied in general is never as thick and creamy as a regular national brand hand soap because the active ingredient itself prevents that from happening in the first place. It's the active ingredient called Benzalkonium Chloride which provides the anti bacterial protection in the soap itself which tends to make the anti bacterial hand soap a lot more watery regardless of which brand you select and considerably less foamy. However, it still suds up more than adequately enough to properly clean your hands under most normal hand washing conditions. I've also used Dial Complete Anti-bacterial soap and the same active ingredient here in Soft soap is exactly the same. Absolutely no difference. The bottom line here is that it really comes down to your own personal priorities as to which product is actually better. Product features like the scent of the liquid or the ergonomic design of the container can all play heavily in on your final decision as to which product you purchase.. Another area of frequent comparison is that both products claim moisturizing ingredients which are supposed to keep your hands softer. Personally, i don't see any difference in either product when it comes to moisturizing your hands. In fact, that's probably the main downside of both products as the antibacterial ingredient regardless of which product you purchase tends to dry your skin more versus using a non antibacterial hand soap you might choose to use instead. Most importantly from a monetary standpoint Soft Soap offers it's product here in a 50 fluid ounce size container and Dial Complete offers instead a 52 fluid ounce bottle. Consequently, it may ultimately just come down to which brand offers the lower price per ounce at any given moment when you're ready to make your purchase as to which product is really the better deal. Regardless, Soft Soap makes a great anti bacterial hand soap. Personally, I'm more than pleased with the results that I get from this product and I highly recommend the purchase. Other than Dial, they have no other competition out there in the marketplace. At least that seems to be the case for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Refreshing Cleanse with Softsoap Antibacterial Liquid Hand Soap Refill
reviews.reviewText: The Softsoap Antibacterial Liquid Hand Soap Refill in White Tea & Berry scent offers a delightful combination of cleanliness and a refreshing fragrance. With its effective antibacterial formula and a generous 50-ounce refill size, this hand soap provides a long-lasting solution for maintaining hygiene in your home or office. In this review, we will explore its cleansing properties, scent, value for money, and overall performance.Softsoap Antibacterial Liquid Hand Soap Refill is formulated to kill germs and bacteria, providing an effective defense against common contaminants. Its antibacterial properties help prevent the spread of harmful microorganisms, giving you peace of mind with each use. Whether you're in a high-traffic area or simply want an extra layer of protection, this hand soap ensures a thorough and hygienic cleanse.The White Tea & Berry scent of this hand soap is a delightful blend of freshness and fruity notes. The invigorating aroma uplifts your senses while leaving a pleasant lingering fragrance on your hands. The combination of white tea and berry creates a harmonious scent that adds a touch of luxury to your handwashing routine.With its generous 50-ounce refill size, this Softsoap hand soap offers long-lasting convenience. The refill bottle allows you to replenish your soap dispenser multiple times, eliminating the need for frequent replacements. This ensures you always have an ample supply of hand soap, making it suitable for both personal use and high-traffic areas.Softsoap Antibacterial Liquid Hand Soap Refill provides excellent value for money. The large refill size offers an economical solution compared to purchasing multiple smaller bottles. Additionally, the effective antibacterial formula and refreshing scent enhance its overall value, as you can confidently rely on this hand soap for both cleanliness and a pleasant handwashing experience.This hand soap not only cleanses effectively but also helps maintain the natural moisture balance of your skin. The gentle formula prevents excessive dryness, leaving your hands feeling soft and smooth after each wash. The liquid consistency lathers well and rinses off easily, making handwashing a quick and efficient process.Softsoap Antibacterial Liquid Hand Soap Refill in the White Tea & Berry scent offers a refreshing and hygienic handwashing experience. With its effective antibacterial formula, delightful fragrance, generous refill size, and moisturizing properties, this hand soap is a reliable choice for maintaining cleanliness and promoting healthy skin. Invest in Softsoap Antibacterial Liquid Hand Soap Refill for a refreshing cleanse that leaves your hands feeling clean, nourished, and lightly scented.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the scent and the moisturizers!!
These soap dispensers arrived on time and as described. The soap does not dry out the skin nor split cuticles while not making the skin feel oily.
I use this in my Simplehuman Sensor Soap Pump and it works beautifully. Scent is pleasant and subtle. Would definitely repurchase!
